attributes.action: People who claim Benefits should have to conduct random blood tests!
attributes.additional_details:
We as tax payers should get a say on who/ whom get our donations.
We pay into it, they sponge off it!
attributes.background:
People in jobs around the world have to conduct blood/urine tests for drink/drug misuse.
If they fail, they get sacked or disciplined.

rejection.details: It is clear that you think that people who claim benefits should have to be tested for drink and/or drugs, but it is not clear what action you believe should follow if someone tests positive for drink and/or drug use.
